const std::map<int, std::function<void()> > InputSystem::keyActions
Initial value:
= {
{GLFW_KEY_W, [this](){
glm::vec3 moveDirection = this->camera.getForward();
moveDirection.y = 0;
this->camera.transform.Position += glm::normalize(moveDirection) * 0.15f;
}},
{GLFW_KEY_S, [this](){
glm::vec3 moveDirection = this->camera.getForward();
moveDirection.y = 0;
this->camera.transform.Position -= glm::normalize(moveDirection) * 0.15f;
}},
{GLFW_KEY_A, [this](){
glm::vec3 moveDirection = glm::normalize(glm::cross(this->camera.getForward(), glm::vec3(0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f)));
moveDirection.y = 0;
this->camera.transform.Position -= moveDirection * 0.1f;
}},
{GLFW_KEY_D, [this](){
glm::vec3 moveDirection = glm::normalize(glm::cross(this->camera.getForward(), glm::vec3(0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f)));
moveDirection.y = 0;
this->camera.transform.Position += moveDirection * 0.1f;
}},
{GLFW_KEY_UP, [this](){ this->camera.rotate(glm::vec3(-0.5f, 0.0f, 0.0f)); }},
{GLFW_KEY_DOWN, [this](){ this->camera.rotate(glm::vec3(0.5f, 0.0f, 0.0f)); }},
{GLFW_KEY_LEFT, [this](){ this->camera.rotate(glm::vec3(0.0f, -0.5f, 0.0f)); }},
{GLFW_KEY_RIGHT, [this](){ this->camera.rotate(glm::vec3(0.0f, 0.5f, 0.0f)); }},
{GLFW_KEY_SPACE, [this](){ this->camera.transform.Position += this->camera.getUp() * 0.1f; }},
{GLFW_KEY_LEFT_CONTROL, [this](){ this->camera.transform.Position -= this->camera.getUp() * 0.1f; }},
{GLFW_KEY_E, [this](){ this->camera.rotate(glm::vec3(0.0f, 0.0f, -0.5f)); }},
{GLFW_KEY_Q, [this](){ this->camera.rotate(glm::vec3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.5f)); }}
}
